cyclone.name: ISAIAS
cyclone.trajectory: Continuing northwest, then turning NNW and paralleling the east coast of Florida before moving toward the Georgia/South Carolina coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Likely first U.S. land interaction along the South Carolina coast late 2020-08-03

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch from Flagler/Volusia County Line to Ponte Vedra Beach, FL (just south of Jacksonville)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Boca Raton to Volusia/Brevard County Line, FL; Storm Surge Watch Jupiter Inlet to Ponte Vedra Beach, FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Entire east coast of Florida, Georgia and the Carolinas within the 5-day cone
weather_observation.wind: Low (≤14%) chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; most likely gusts 25–35 mph early Monday
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor coastal surge possible (around 2 ft) mainly south of the St. Johns River inlet; less than 3 ft expected at the port
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–2 inches with locally 3 inches possible Sunday night–Monday; brief ponding in low areas
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents beginning Sunday
